title: Screen Res settings won't save
body: Every time I get into a game, the league window is tiny, I have to change my screen resolution back every time and it never saves. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
My best estimate is that a few of your config files may have been corrupted.  You may need to delete your config files.  This may require you to re-do all your in-game settings, but should allow them to save and update properly. Go ahead and try this:

* Log into League of Legends
           *  Important! If you delete these files before logging on the server will just give you a copy of your last know config
* Navigate to your Config folder (Default is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)
* Delete Game.cfg and PersistedSettings.json
* Load into a Custom game and update settings appropriately

Let me know if this helps!
